posts.title: Insensitivity And The Nature Of Assumptions
posts.summary: What are assumptions and when are they useful? Is it insensitive to ever assume something about a person's identity? A conversation with a coworker prompted me to explore what it means to assume something about a person and when we should think twice about it.

posts.title: Dynamics of Recurrent Neural Network Models of Working Memory
posts.summary: A brief review of my undergraduate thesis at Princeton exploring the dynamics of highly recurrent neural networks trained on working memory tasks.
